lead_paragraph: The collapse of the bridge near Minnesota’s border with Canada shut a busy train route that connects the Pacific Coast with Chicago.

headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Railroad Bridge Burns and Collapses
headline.main: Minnesota: Railroad Bridge Burns and Collapses

snippet: The collapse of the bridge near Minnesota’s border with Canada shut a busy train route that connects the Pacific Coast with Chicago.
abstract: Wooden railroad bridge in Koochiching County, Minn, burns and collapses, cutting off busy train route between West Coast and Chicago.
